snippet: Updated: Damage reports are due Friday, and Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said the city was willing to conduct more inspections before making the tax assessments final, so he encouraged people to speak up.
abstract: Updated: Damage reports are due Friday, and Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said the city was willing to conduct more inspections before making the tax assessments final, so he encouraged people to speak up.

headline.main: Deadline to Fight Assessments on Hurricane-Damaged Homes
